bibl.title: Telegram from the International Health Board to Henry Hanson, December 26, 1923

div1.p: This is a decoded telegram from the I.H.B. to Hanson mentioning the Carters.

div1.head: Telegram from the International Health Board to Henry Hanson, December 26, 1923
div1.opener:
I. H. B-
Hanson
CODE ADDRESS
ROCKFOUND
CONFIRMATION OF CABLE MESSAGE
-----------
MISSIONS FIVE
LETTER CODE
THE ROCKEFELLER FOUNDATION
61 BROADWAY, NEW YORK
Date December 26, 1923
div1.p:
To: Dr. Henry Hanson
Balboa, (Canal Zone)

From: International Health Board
61 Broadway, New York, N. Y., U. S. A.

The following message has today been sent to you
If this does not agree with your records advise us immediately.
